intro.title: Introdução
intro.description:
Lil Gnars will organize a series of 2 events along the beautiful shores of Rio de Janeiro, where professional skateboarders will engage with local youth. Through fun challenges and missions, we will in still knowledge about skateboarding as well as the importance of healthy living, street safety, Nature Care and responsible behavior. 

 Will Be in Maricá and Saquarema, a Cities with a new urbanism. Wich they maded a new Urbanism Perfect for be explored n Shreded. Saquarema got a new big skatepark and Maricá got a New SideWalks and Big Plaza for be Shreded.

Lil Gnars 2.achievements: Segundo dia do nosso evento incrível com a nova geração do skate brasileiro puro, nos divertimos e amamos!

Lil Gnars 3.achievements: O último dia do Lil Gnars foi pura diversão e sorrisos no rosto no nosso churrasco, no pôr do sol demos ao Lil Gnars pranchas novas para as crianças! A vibe era indescritível.
